description: An object containing information about dividends income in the retrieved tax calculation.

totalChargeableDividends.description: Total chargeable dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalUkDividends.description: Total UK dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source.

incomeSourceType.description: The income source type for UK dividends.

dividends.description: Amount of UK dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

otherUkDividends.description: Amount of other UK dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

customerReference.description: A reference unique to the customer.

grossAmount.description: Gross amount for other dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableForeignDividends.description: Amount of chargeable foreign dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeSourceType.description: The income source type for the dividend.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. This value must in ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

grossIncome.description: Gross income for foreign dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.description: Net income for foreign dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.description: Tax deducted for foreign dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed. This value must be true or false.

dividendIncomeReceivedWhilstAbroad.description: An array detailing dividend income received whilst abroad.

incomeSourceType.description: The income source type for the dividend.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. This value must in ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

grossIncome.description: Gross income for foreign dividends received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.description: Net income for foreign dividends received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.description: Tax deducted for foreign dividends received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed. This value must be true or false.
